text: hey this is Seema again and today I am
bringing you a new lesson on the
difference between the words work job
and business well each of these three
words are used quite interchangeably in
fact a lot of times we substitute the
word work for job and vice versa however
the difference between the words work
job and business are quite evident so
let's see what the main difference is
the first word is work well the word
work is one of the most frequently used
word in our everyday language we say
things like how was work we say things
like I hate going to work sometimes you
may say I am going to work but work is
mainly used in two main contexts
what are they the first we need to
remember that work is a place work is a
place that you go to so when I'm saying
something like I am going to work I'm
talking about the place of my employment
so maybe I am going to a hotel where I
am working
maybe I am working in a call center
maybe I'm going to a factory so that is
a place that I go to and therefore I say
I am going to work now work can also be
used in us in a very different context
so work can also talk about all the
things at work or all the things that
happen at work so if I were to maybe
draw a square
and say that this square is work a lot
of things happen while I'm at work I
have to deal with work colleagues I have
to deal with an angry boss I have to
deal with my job or the actual duties I
have to deal with the food or the
cafeteria when I am working and a lot of
other components at work so as you can
see work is a really big it means a lot
of things it talks about everything that
happens while I am at work so when I say
how was work you know maybe I've come
back from work from the place of
employment and then you know my friend
oxes me how was work so what is she
asking me she's asking me how was
everything that happened at work so how
was how was the work colleagues did you
have a problem with them how was things
with the boss did you have a problem
with him how was things with your jobs
did you have a problem doing what you
were supposed to do so basically work
talks about everything related to what
happens while you are going to your
place of employment so we have example
sentences like how is work and I'm going
to work so we're dealing with work in
two different contexts and then we have
the word called job
okay well job is another very commonly
used word we all want a new job we're
all going to find a job so what does job
really mean job is nothing but it talks
about the specific designation of a
person so I can say I have the job of a
bank manager because that is my
designation or I could talk about the
job duties so if you are a call center
employee what is your job my job
involves taking calls or you can say my
job involves giving good customer
service to people who call in that
reference to your precise job duties or
responsibilities you can also talk about
job as the kind of company you are
working for so I can say that I I have a
job in a multinational company okay so
it's a job reference to again your
designation
what is your post in the company the
specific job duties involved and the
kind of company that you are working for
if you look at this square again okay as
I said this is work which we've already
dealt with but job is only one part of
work so work is a bigger terminology but
job is just one small part of work and
then you have something very common
again the word business well business is
again a very economic term used and you
know you read it always in newspapers in
magazines in books but business can also
mean a lot of things business firstly
deals with me owning or running my own
my own business or something that I am
doing because I am self-employed so if
you are self-employed you own a business
and that's when you will use the word
business so suppose I have my own
clothing line so I can say something
like I
on my business which is a clothing line
with the help of four employees business
can also involve the actual things that
you do in a job so suppose our you know
I my job my job involves you know
copping you know photocopying you know
papers or you know doing Xerox copies of
some document so my business involves
each of those things that I am doing
while I am doing that work so suppose
somebody else irritates me while I am
going about my work I can say mind your
own business so basically I am minding
or doing my own work doing my own
business but somebody else is
interfering and that's why I say mind
your business so let's learn again
business can refer to a person who is
self-employed and therefore he says I am
running my business with the help of
four employees but business in the other
context can refer to the actual economic
activity or the actual kind of things
you do in a job it is quite similar to
the job duties that I spoke of while
dealing with the word job well that
